title: Wokyo
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An Asian-inspired noodle bar located a few steps from the Bonnington Hotel. Menu contains a number of clearly marked vegan choices. The concept sees you picking your sauce, type of noodles, and the protein you want in the noodle dish, and chef then woks it all up for you. You can watch them do it and uses separate preparation and woking accessories for vegan dishes. Free Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: Jumeirah Lakes Towers, Cluster J, J2 Building
